infos.value: The excellence of our soldiers is beyond question.
Why can we not pierce through to Sadali's territory!?
I am sorry, Darling. Did my firepower leave something to be desired—?
It's not your fault. There's no need to apologize.
I doubt even Schuzelt's presence would have given us the edge to break through.
Our advance could never be hindered by one of them alone, could it!?
Whatever is the matter, Darling? It isn't like you to be so fainthearted!
If you wish for me to stop...
Onward! I swear on the name of «Solidus» that we will break through Sadali's defenses!
